content:
Center Court

Wimbledon Center Court is the main court at the All England Club, with a capacity of 15,000. It is known for its iconic retractable roof and has hosted many historic matches.

court1

One of the main four courts in Wimbledon Park. Used for specific events while the Centre court is used. It has a capacity of 12,345.

One of the main four courts in Wimbledon Park. Used for specific events while the Centre court is used. It has a capacity of 4,000.
